name: BattleGround (itch)
description:
In BattleGround , you face your friend as an enemy . You both try to shoot each other to ensure the opponent(Your Friend) is short of hearts .  However , you both play on the same KeyBoard.

Instructions :-

Player 1 Controls :-

D to move forward  --  A to move Backward -- W to jump -- S to Shoot

Player 2 Controls :-

L to move forward  --  J to move Backward -- I to jump -- K to Shoot

To Win:-

Eliminate the opponent (Your Friend ) by shooting him and taking his hearts
